alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Susquehanna; Wayne; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 3:58PM EDT until July 22 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Susquehanna County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Lackawanna County in northeastern Pennsylvania... West central Wayne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Northeastern Wyoming County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 358 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lake Carey, or near Tunkhannock, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Scranton, Falls, Dunmore, Carbondale, Old Forge, Archbald, Blakely, Taylor, Dickson City and Moosic. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
